content: प्रत्याहारः {@--1@} Drawing back, marching back, retreat. {@--2@} Keeping back, withholding. {@--3@} Restraining the organs. {@--4@} Dissolution of the world, {@--5@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The comprehension of several letters or affixes into one syllable, effected by combining the first letter of a Sūtra with its final indicatory letter, or in the case of several Sūtras, with the final letter of the last member; thus अण् is the प्रत्याहार of the Sūtra अइउण्; अच् (vowels) of the four Sūtras अइउण्, ऋऌक्, एओङ्, ऐऔच्; हल् of the consonants; अल् of all letters. {@--6@} Abridgment.
